doc.name: paragraph
doc.summary: Designates a string as part of a chunk expression, delimited by either a return character or the Unicode paragraph separator (0x2029).

examples.example: get the last paragraph of tText

description.overview: Use the paragraph keyword to refer to one or more paragraphs in a container.
description.comments:
A paragraph is a chunk delimited by either a return character or the Unicode paragraph separator (0x2029).
The paragraph chunk is identical to the line chunk, except that it is also delimited by the paragraph separator character. This reflects the paragraph breaking exhibited by LiveCode fields.
